overview: After Claire Castel and Lana Rhoades, it's Clea Gaultier's turn to know the game of submission under Hervé Bodilis' camera.  Discover how the young and beautiful Clea Gaultier will have to accept to submit to the fight; his new teacher, embodied here by Philippe Soine.  Clea is a crazy lover of Jean Lefort, a master SM. She loves him with a love so strong that she can not bear Jean being able to have other women.  To help him to free himself from this feeling that is too powerful, Jean confides Philippe the younger Clea to continue her initiation.  Clea is thus going to cover Philippe but also the friend of this one: Claire. The young woman will see her life change under the influence of the couple. It is without limit that Clea will be submitted.
title: Cléa, Desires of Submission
